h2.a: OPS Named “Best Community for Music Education”

h2.a: Howard Named OHS Dean of Instruction

article.class: elementor-post elementor-grid-item post-2180 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-general

h2.a: OPS BOARD NAMES DR. MATTHEW CONSTANT DISTRICT’S 20th SUPERINTENDENT

div.p: Owensboro, Ky. (March 26, 2020) – The Owensboro Public School Board unanimously voted to name Dr. Matthew Constant the district’s 20th superintendent. Dr. Constant will maintain the interim title
